mapper.sql: id as id , university_id as universityId , major_name as majorName , major_type as majorType , education_level as educationLevel , gain_degree as gainDegree , major_rank as majorRank , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , is_delete as isDelete
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_university_major ( university_id, major_name, major_type, education_level, gain_degree, major_rank, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{universityId}, #{majorName}, #{majorType}, #{educationLevel}, #{gainDegree}, #{majorRank}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{isDelete} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_major
university_id = #{universityId},
major_name = #{majorName},
major_type = #{majorType},
education_level = #{educationLevel},
gain_degree = #{gainDegree},
major_rank = #{majorRank},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_university_major
university_id = #{map.universityId},
major_name = #{map.majorName},
major_type = #{map.majorType},
education_level = #{map.educationLevel},
gain_degree = #{map.gainDegree},
major_rank = #{map.majorRank},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
is_delete = #{map.isDelete},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_university_major ( university_id, major_name, major_type, education_level, gain_degree, major_rank, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{map.universityId}, #{map.majorName}, #{map.majorType}, #{map.educationLevel}, #{map.gainDegree}, #{map.majorRank}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, university_id
, major_name
, major_type
, education_level
, gain_degree
, major_rank
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, is_delete
FROM zgk_university_major
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND university_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND major_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorName} , '%')
AND major_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorType} , '%')
AND education_level like CONCAT('%', #{condition.educationLevel} , '%')
AND gain_degree like CONCAT('%', #{condition.gainDegree} , '%')
AND major_rank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorRank} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND is_delete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
